Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Evil Deity: Egyptian-Set (CE)

Linguist: +1 Intelligence
Superior Mobility: +10 Speed
Ability Boosts: 2 to distribute
Reliable Talent: Scores at least a 10 on proficient ability rolls
Features/Skills
Proficiency Bonus: 6
Feat Count: General: 6 Selectable Feature Count: Rogue (Roguish Archetype)
Feats: Ability Boost; Durable; Lightly Armored; Linguist; Magic Initiate (Cleric); Sharpshooter Human Features: Human Ability Adjustment; Language (Common; Choose 1 from any) Rogue Features: Ambush Master; Armor Proficiency (Light); Blindsense; Cunning Action; Ear For Deceit; Elegant Maneuver; Elusive; Evasion; Expertise (Rogue); Eye For Detail; Eye For Weakness; Fancy Footwork; Inquisitive; Insightful Fighting; Insightful Manipulator; Master Duelist; Master Of Intrigue; Master Of Tactics; Mastermind; Misdirection; Panache; Rakish Audacity; Reliable Talent; Roguish Archetype; Save Proficiency (Dexterity; Intelligence); Scout; Skill Proficiency (Choose 4 from Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Performance, Persuasion, Sleight Of Hand, Stealth); Skirmisher; Slippery Mind; Sneak Attack; Soul Of Deceit; Steady Eye; Stroke Of Luck; Sudden Strike; Superior Mobility; Survivalist; Swashbuckler; Thieves' Cant; Tool Proficiency (Thieves' Tools); Uncanny Dodge; Unerring Eye; Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons; Hand Crossbow; Longsword; Rapier; Shortsword) Acolyte Features: Language (Choose 2 from any); Shelter Of The Faithful; Skill Proficiency (Insight; Religion)
Feature Notes:
Roguish Archetype: 1 selection
Insightful Manipulator: May learn 2 of relative Charisma, Intelligence, Wisdom, and levels of target after 1 min study
Linguist: Can create ciphers (DC 24 Intelligence to decode)
Master Of Intrigue: May mimic accent and speech patterns after listening for 1 min
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of Egyptian-Set and fellow believers
Unerring Eye: R30' May sense illusions and other deceptions 1/long rest
Skill Proficiency: Deception; Insight; Intimidation; Nature; Performance; Persuasion; Religion; Survival

Acrobatics: (dex) 1 Insight: (wis) 6 Performance: (cha) 8
Animal Handling: (wis) 0 Intimidation: (cha) 8 Persuasion: (cha) 8
Arcana: (int) 4 Investigation: (int) 4 Religion: (int) 10
Athletics: (str) 3 Medicine: (wis) 0 Sleight Of Hand: (dex) 1
Deception: (cha) 8 Nature: (int) 22 Stealth: (dex) 1
History: (int) 4 Perception: (wis) 0 Survival: (wis) 12
Tool Proficiency: Dice Set; Disguise Kit; Forgery Kit; Thieves' Tools
Languages: Abyssal; Common; Deep Speech; Dwarvish; Giant; Goblin; Infernal; Primordial
Skill Notes:
Linguist: Language (Choose 3 from any)
Master Of Intrigue: Language (Choose 2 from any)/Tool Proficiency (Disguise Kit/Forgery Kit/Choose 1 from any Game)
Survivalist: +6 Nature/+6 Survival
Blindsense: R10' Knows the location of hidden and invisible creatures
Bulky Armor: Has disadvantage on Stealth
Ear For Deceit: Minimum 8 on Insight rolls
Elegant Maneuver: May use a bonus action to gain Adv on next Acrobatics or Athletics for 1 rd
Expertise (Rogue): +6 on 4 chosen proficient skills or Thieves' Tools
Eye For Detail: May use a bonus action to use Perception to a spot hidden item or Investigation to uncover a clue
Panache: Successful Persuasion vs. Insight gives hostile target Disadv on attacks on others (others attack ends) or charms a non-hostile target (damage ends) for 1 min
Steady Eye: Adv on Perception and Investigation after moving half speed
Thieves'Cant: Understands jargon and signs known only by rogues
Combat
Hit Points: 109 Initiative: 3 Armor Class: 12 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Light Weapon Proficiency: Hand Crossbow; Longsword; Rapier; Shortsword; Simple Weapons
Armor: Padded Shield: None Weapons: Greatclub (+9 1d8+3); Mace (+9 1d6+3); Shortbow (+7 1d6+1 R80/320); Unarmed (+9 1+3)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Lightly Armored: Armor Proficiency (Light)
Rakish Audacity: +2 Initiative
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Damage Adjustment: +3
Ambush Master: Adv on Initiative/Allies gain Adv on attacks for 1 rd on first foe struck in first rd
Cunning Action: Can use a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide once per rd
Durable: Regains a minimum of 4 hit points from a Hit Die roll
Elusive: Attacks on self never have advantage
Eye For Weakness: Insightful Fighting inflicts +3d6 HP Sneak Attack damage
Fancy Footwork: Attacked foe cannot make an OA against self for 1 rd
Insightful Fighting: May use a bonus action and a successful Insight vs. foe Deception to make Sneak Attacks w/out Adv against target for 1 min
Master Duelist: May reroll a miss with Adv 1/short rest
Master Of Tactics: R30' May use Help as a bonus action
Misdirection: May use Reaction to redirect an attack from self to a creature that provides cover
Rakish Audacity: May use Sneak Attack w/out Adv when target is only adjacent foe (Disadv neg)
Sharpshooter: Suffers no disadvantage on attacks at long range/Ranged attacks ignore 3/4 cover/Can make a -5 attack with a ranged weapon to inflict +10 damage
Skirmisher: May use Reaction to move half speed w/out provoking an OA when a foe comes w/in 5'
Sneak Attack: +10d6 damage on attacks with advantage or on a foe threatened by another adjacent creature
Stroke Of Luck: Can change a miss into a hit or take an automatic 20 on an ability check once per short rest
Sudden Strike: May use a bonus action for an extra attack, which may be a Sneak Attack on a second foe
Uncanny Dodge: Can use a reaction to reduce damage taken from an attack by half
Save Proficiency: Dexterity; Intelligence; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 2; Dexterity: 7; Intelligence: 10; Strength: 3; Wisdom: 6
Save Notes:
Slippery Mind: Save Proficiency (Wisdom)
Evasion: Successful Dexterity saves yield no damage instead of half, and failures yield half damage
Soul Of Deceit: Immune to telepathy, may use Deception vs. Insight to present false thoughts, and always detects as telling the truth
Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 2; C1: 1 Attack: C: 6 Spell DC: C: 14
Spells:
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save within concentration up to 1 min
Shield Of Faith (C1 Abju): R60' Target gains +2 AC for concentration up to 10 min
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects—a booming voice, modification of flames, harmless tremors, an illusory sound, movement of a door or window, or a change in eye appearance—for 1 min
Magic Notes: Magic Initiate (Cleric): Knows 2 cleric cantrips and can cast a chosen C1 spell once per long rest
